Class Tower

  • java.lang.Object
    • greenfoot.Actor
      • Entity
        • Tower
  • public abstract class Tower
extends Entity
    The tower is a non-moving entity. They attack soldiers that go near them. There are 4 types of towers: the archer tower, the crytal tower, the inferno tower and the gold mine.
    Version:
    (a version number or a date)
    Author:
    (Benny Wu)
